title: Andhra Woman Swept Away In Malaysia Sewage Drain After Footpath Collapses
content: A 45-year-old woman from Andhra Pradesh has gone missing in Malaysia's capital Kuala Lumpur after being swept away into a sewage drain after the footpath she was walking on collapsed suddenly.
summary: A 45-year-old woman from Andhra Pradesh has gone missing in Malaysia's capital Kuala Lumpur after being swept away into a sewage drain after the footpath she was walking on collapsed suddenly.

title: Hezbollah: The Iran-Backed Group That Once Went To Month-Long War With Israel
content: Hezbollah, which has exchanged fire with Israeli forces since October, last went to war with Israel in 2006 and has since expanded its domestic and regional influence, politically and militarily.
summary: Hezbollah, which has exchanged fire with Israeli forces since October, last went to war with Israel in 2006 and has since expanded its domestic and regional influence, politically and militarily.

title: As Starliner Returns Without Sunita Williams, Boeing Faces $1 Billion Loss
content: NASA, on Saturday, announcedthat Boeing's Starliner capsule will return empty from the International Space Station (ISS), citing ongoing propulsion system problems.
summary: NASA, on Saturday, announcedthat Boeing's Starliner capsule will return empty from the International Space Station (ISS), citing ongoing propulsion system problems.

title: Journalist Missing, 2 Others Injured After Missile Strike On Ukraine Hotel
content: A member of the Reuters team covering the war in Ukraine was missing and two others were hospitalised after a strike on a hotel in the eastern Ukrainian city of Kramatorsk.
summary: A member of the Reuters team covering the war in Ukraine was missing and two others were hospitalised after a strike on a hotel in the eastern Ukrainian city of Kramatorsk.

title: Circus Performer In UK Falls From Tightrope In Front Of Horrified Audience
content: The performer was seated on a chair balanced on a pole held by two men as they navigated a tightrope 16 feet in the air.
summary: The performer was seated on a chair balanced on a pole held by two men as they navigated a tightrope 16 feet in the air.

title: Sunita Williams And Butch Wilmore: The Two Astronauts Stuck In Space
content: Two veteran NASA astronauts with a combined 500 days of previous spaceflight were the first crew launched into space on Boeing's Starliner space capsule, in a June 5 test flight from Florida. They had been scheduled to return in about eight days.
summary: Two veteran NASA astronauts with a combined 500 days of previous spaceflight were the first crew launched into space on Boeing's Starliner space capsule, in a June 5 test flight from Florida. They had been scheduled to return in about eight days.

title: 35 Killed In 2 Separate Bus Accidents In Pakistan
content: At least 35 people were killed in two separate bus accidents in Pakistan on Sunday, including 12 pilgrims who had been trying to reach Iran, rescue and hospital officials said.
summary: At least 35 people were killed in two separate bus accidents in Pakistan on Sunday, including 12 pilgrims who had been trying to reach Iran, rescue and hospital officials said.

title: Ex Bangladesh Minister Arrested Amid Crackdown On Awami League Leaders
content: Bangladesh's former textile and jute minister Golam Dastagir Gazi has been arrested as the police take stern measures against officials and ministers of the ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina's Awami League government, according to media reports.
summary: Bangladesh's former textile and jute minister Golam Dastagir Gazi has been arrested as the police take stern measures against officials and ministers of the ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina's Awami League government, according to media reports.

title: "Made A Big Mistake": Former US Pilot Who Tried To Shut Off Plane's Engines
content: He attributed his actions to a mental breakdown, stating that he had been struggling with depression and had ingested psychedelic mushrooms 48 hours before the incident.
summary: He attributed his actions to a mental breakdown, stating that he had been struggling with depression and had ingested psychedelic mushrooms 48 hours before the incident.

title: 3 Years On, US Still Hunts Attackers Who Killed Americans During Afghan Exit
content: Three years after the suicide bomber attack at Afghanistan's Abbey Gate that killed 13 US service personnel and about 170 Afghan civilians, the network behind the perpetrator is "pretty degraded" but not eliminated, the Pentagon said.
summary: Three years after the suicide bomber attack at Afghanistan's Abbey Gate that killed 13 US service personnel and about 170 Afghan civilians, the network behind the perpetrator is "pretty degraded" but not eliminated, the Pentagon said.

title: Putin "Played" With Trump's "Ego, Insecurities", Says His Former Aid
content: The new behind-the-scenes details from HR McMaster, Donald Trump's second national security adviser, come as Americans are set to decide whether the former president should return to the White House.
summary: The new behind-the-scenes details from HR McMaster, Donald Trump's second national security adviser, come as Americans are set to decide whether the former president should return to the White House.

title: Who Was Fuad Shukr, Hezbollah Commander Whose Death Sparked Today's Conflict
content: Lebanon- based militant group Hezbollah fired a large number of missiles at Israel on Sunday, retaliating for the assassination of their senior commander Fuad Shukr in Beirut last month.
summary: Lebanon- based militant group Hezbollah fired a large number of missiles at Israel on Sunday, retaliating for the assassination of their senior commander Fuad Shukr in Beirut last month.

title: Humanity Is Killing The Great Barrier Reef, Warns Report
content: The Great Barrier Reef will continue to deteriorate, largely due to climate change, and the window to secure its future is rapidly closing. That is the sobering conclusion of a major new report into the state of the reef.
summary: The Great Barrier Reef will continue to deteriorate, largely due to climate change, and the window to secure its future is rapidly closing. That is the sobering conclusion of a major new report into the state of the reef.

title: Explained: The Case Against Telegram CEO That Got Him Arrested In France
content: Pavel Durov, the CEO of the popular messaging app Telegram, was arrested by French police on Saturday evening at Le Bourget airport.
summary: Pavel Durov, the CEO of the popular messaging app Telegram, was arrested by French police on Saturday evening at Le Bourget airport.

title: Iran-Backed Hezbollah Says It Launched Over 320 Katyusha Rockets At Israel
content: Hezbollah said Sunday it had launched more than 320 rockets at Israel overnight, targeting a string of military positions, even as Israel's military said it was carrying out pre-emptive strikes against the group.
summary: Hezbollah said Sunday it had launched more than 320 rockets at Israel overnight, targeting a string of military positions, even as Israel's military said it was carrying out pre-emptive strikes against the group.

title: Live Updates: Israel Declares 48-Hour Emergency After Hezbollah Strikes
content: Israel today announced that it was conducting pre-emptive strikes in Lebanon after detecting preparations for "large-scale" attacks by the Iran-backed group Hezbollah.
summary: Israel today announced that it was conducting pre-emptive strikes in Lebanon after detecting preparations for "large-scale" attacks by the Iran-backed group Hezbollah.

title: "Self-Defence": Israel Says Fired On Lebanon To Prevent Hezbollah Attack
content: Israel today said that is launched strikes inside Lebanon as a "self-defence act" to prevent a Hezbollah attack on civilians, Israel Defense Forces spokesperson Daniel Hagari said.
summary: Israel today said that is launched strikes inside Lebanon as a "self-defence act" to prevent a Hezbollah attack on civilians, Israel Defense Forces spokesperson Daniel Hagari said.

title: Israel Declares Emergency As Hezbollah Announces "Large-Scale" Attacks
content: Lebanon-based Hezbollah announced on Sunday large-scale rocket and drone launches towards Israel in an "initial response" to a top commander's killing.
summary: Lebanon-based Hezbollah announced on Sunday large-scale rocket and drone launches towards Israel in an "initial response" to a top commander's killing.

title: Kamala Harris Faces Uphill Battle To Win Back Muslim Votes In Swing State
content: In key US swing state Michigan, Democratic voters of Arab and Middle Eastern heritage say Kamala Harris is going to have to win them back after they were alienated by President Joe Biden's handling of Israel's military offensive in Gaza.
summary: In key US swing state Michigan, Democratic voters of Arab and Middle Eastern heritage say Kamala Harris is going to have to win them back after they were alienated by President Joe Biden's handling of Israel's military offensive in Gaza.

title: Top US Scientist Hospitalised For West Nile Virus, Now Recovering At Home
content: The West Nile virus is mainly transmitted through the bite of infected mosquitoes.
summary: The West Nile virus is mainly transmitted through the bite of infected mosquitoes.
